html: (2 Nephi 13:2-3)."Mighty man … man of war … [etc.]." When we look at the Hebrew words in this passage, we learn that among those of whom Israel will be deprived are leaders ("mighty man"), warriors and military chiefs ("man of war"), diviners ("prudent"), the elder who holds village office ("ancient"), men of repute ("honorable man"), skilled craftsmen or wise men of magic arts ("cunning artificer"), and the skillful enchanter ("eloquent orator").
